subject: Preakness Stakes
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
California Chrome (Race Horse)
Horse Racing
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
lead_paragraph: The Kentucky Derby winner California Chrome added a victory in the Preakness Stakes, keeping alive his bid to become the 12th Triple Crown winner and the first since Affirmed in 1978.
snippet: The Kentucky Derby winner California Chrome added a victory in the Preakness Stakes, keeping alive his bid to become the 12th Triple Crown winner and the first since Affirmed in 1978.
